short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creates a *.csv file with the votes you gave to movies on Kinopoisk

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The main goal of the extension is to bring back a an option for downloading the result of your votes. That option has been removed a few years ago, so now the only way to download your ratings is to copy/paste them manually one by one, or use an external solution such this extension.
